34 BackwardGlobalPlanner::BackwardGlobalPlanner()
35 {
36  skip_straight_motion_distance_=0.2;
37 }

39 BackwardGlobalPlanner::~BackwardGlobalPlanner()
40 {
41  //clear
42  nav_msgs::Path planMsg;
43  planMsg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
44  planPub_.publish(planMsg);
45 }

52 void BackwardGlobalPlanner::initialize(std::string name, costmap_2d::Costmap2DROS* costmap_ros)
53 {
54  //ROS_INFO_NAMED("Backwards", "BackwardGlobalPlanner initialize");
55  costmap_ros_ = costmap_ros;
56  //ROS_WARN_NAMED("Backwards", "initializating global planner, costmap address: %ld", (long)costmap_ros);
57 
58  forwardPathSub_ = nh_.subscribe("odom_tracker_path", 2, &BackwardGlobalPlanner::onForwardTrailMsg, this);
59 
60  ros::NodeHandle nh;
61  cmd_server_ = nh.advertiseService<backward_global_planner::command::Request , backward_global_planner::command::Response >("cmd", boost::bind(&BackwardGlobalPlanner::commandServiceCall,this,_1,_2));
62  planPub_ = nh.advertise<nav_msgs::Path>("backward_planner/global_plan", 1);
63  markersPub_ = nh.advertise<visualization_msgs::MarkerArray>("backward_planner/markers", 1);
64 }
65 
71 void BackwardGlobalPlanner::onForwardTrailMsg(const nav_msgs::Path::ConstPtr& trailMessage)
72 {
73  lastForwardPathMsg_ = *trailMessage;
74 }
75 
81 void BackwardGlobalPlanner::publishGoalMarker(const geometry_msgs::Pose& pose, double r, double g, double b)
82 {
83  double phi = tf::getYaw(pose.orientation);
84  visualization_msgs::Marker marker;
85  marker.header.frame_id = "/odom";
86  marker.header.stamp = ros::Time::now ();
87  marker.ns = "my_namespace2";
88  marker.id = 0;
89  marker.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::ARROW;
90  marker.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
91  marker.scale.x=0.1;
92  marker.scale.y=0.3;
93  marker.scale.z=0.1;
94  marker.color.a= 1.0;
95  marker.color.r = r;
96  marker.color.g = g;
97  marker.color.b = b;
98 
99  geometry_msgs::Point start,end;
100  start.x= pose.position.x;
101  start.y =pose.position.y;
102 
103  end.x = pose.position.x + 0.5 * cos(phi);
104  end.y = pose.position.y + 0.5 * sin(phi);
105 
106  marker.points.push_back(start);
107  marker.points.push_back(end);
108 
109  visualization_msgs::MarkerArray ma;
110  ma.markers.push_back(marker);
111 
112  markersPub_.publish(ma);
113 }
114 
120 bool BackwardGlobalPlanner::createPureSpiningAndStragihtLineBackwardPath(const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& start,
121 const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& goal, std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& plan)
122 {
123  //tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> tfpose;
124  //ROS_WARN_NAMED("Backwards", "getting robot pose referencing costmap: %ld", (long)costmap_ros_);
125 
126  auto q = start.pose.orientation;
127 
128  double dx = start.pose.position.x - goal.pose.position.x ;
129  double dy = start.pose.position.y - goal.pose.position.y ;
130 
131  double lenght = sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy);
132 
133  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped prevState;
134  if (lenght > skip_straight_motion_distance_)
135  {
136  // skip initial pure spinning and initial straight motion
137  //ROS_INFO("1 - heading to goal position pure spinning");
138  double heading_direction = atan2(dy, dx) ;
139  double startyaw = tf::getYaw(q);
140  double offset = angles::shortest_angular_distance(startyaw, heading_direction);
141  heading_direction = startyaw+offset;
142 
143  prevState = reel_path_tools::makePureSpinningSubPlan(start, heading_direction, plan, puresSpinningRadStep_);
144  //ROS_INFO("2 - going forward keep orientation pure straight");
145 
146  prevState = reel_path_tools::makePureStraightSubPlan(prevState, goal.pose.position, lenght, plan);
147  }
148  else
149  {
150  prevState = start;
151  }
152 }
153 
159 bool BackwardGlobalPlanner::createDefaultBackwardPath(const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& start,
160 const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& goal, std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& plan)
161 {
162  auto q = start.pose.orientation;
163 
164  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
165  pose = start;
166 
167  plan.push_back(pose);
168 
169  //ROS_WARN_NAMED("Backwards", "Iterating in last forward cord path");
170  int i=lastForwardPathMsg_.poses.size();
171  double mindist =std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
172  int mindistindex = -1;
173 
174  geometry_msgs::Pose goalProjected;
175 
176  for (auto& p : lastForwardPathMsg_.poses | boost::adaptors::reversed)
177  {
178  pose = p;
179  pose.header.frame_id = costmap_ros_->getGlobalFrameID();
180  pose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
181 
182  double dx = pose.pose.position.x - goal.pose.position.x;
183  double dy = pose.pose.position.y - goal.pose.position.y;
184 
185  double dist = sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy);
186  if(dist <= mindist)
187  {
188  mindistindex = i;
189  mindist = dist;
190  goalProjected = pose.pose;
191  }
192 
193  i--;
194  }
195 
196  if(mindistindex != -1)
197  {
198  for (int i = lastForwardPathMsg_.poses.size() -1 ; i>=mindistindex ;i--)
199  {
200  auto& pose = lastForwardPathMsg_.poses[i];
201  plan.push_back(pose);
202  }
203  }
204  else
205  {
206  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Creating the backwards plan, it is not found any close trajectory point. Last forward path plan message size: " << lastForwardPathMsg_.poses.size());
207  }
208 }
209 
215 bool BackwardGlobalPlanner::makePlan(const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& start,
216  const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& goal, std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& plan)
217 {
218  //ROS_WARN_NAMED("Backwards", "Backwards global planner: Generating global plan ");
219  //ROS_WARN_NAMED("Backwards", "Clearing...");
220 
221  plan.clear();
222 
223  this->createDefaultBackwardPath(start, goal, plan);
224  //this->createPureSpiningAndStragihtLineBackwardPath(start, goal, plan);
225 
226  //ROS_INFO_STREAM(" start - " << start);
227  //ROS_INFO_STREAM(" end - " << goal.pose.position);
228 
229  //ROS_INFO("3 - heading to goal orientation");
230  //double goalOrientation = angles::normalize_angle(tf::getYaw(goal.pose.orientation));
231  //reel_path_tools::makePureSpinningSubPlan(prevState,goalOrientation,plan);
232 
233  //ROS_WARN_STREAM( "MAKE PLAN INVOKED, plan size:"<< plan.size());
234  publishGoalMarker(goal.pose,1.0,0,1.0);
235 
236  nav_msgs::Path planMsg;
237  planMsg .poses = plan;
238  planMsg.header.frame_id="/odom";
239  planPub_.publish(planMsg);
240 
241  if (plan.size() <=1)
242  {
243  ROS_INFO("cannot create backward plan");
244  return false;
245  }
246  else
247  {
248  return true;
249  }
250 }
251 
257 bool BackwardGlobalPlanner::makePlan(const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& start,
258  const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& goal, std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& plan,
259  double& cost)
260 {
261  cost = 0;
262  makePlan(start, goal, plan);
263  return true;
264 }

271 bool BackwardGlobalPlanner::commandServiceCall(backward_global_planner::command::Request &req, backward_global_planner::command::Response &res)
272 {
273  //ROS_INFO_NAMED("Backwards", "BackwardGlobalplanner SERVICE CALL");
274  std::string msg = req.cmd.data.c_str();
275 
276  std::vector<std::string> fields; // Create a vector of strings, called "fields"
277  boost::split(fields, msg, boost::algorithm::is_any_of(" "));
278 
279  //ROS_INFO_NAMED("Backwards", "backward planner SERVICE REQUEST");
280 
281  if(fields.size() == 0 )
282  {
283  res.success.data = false;
284  return false;
285  }
286 
287  std::string cmd = fields[0];
288  bool error = false;
289  if(cmd == "savepath")
290  {
291  //ROS_INFO_NAMED("Backwards","SAVE PATH COMMAND");
292  if(fields.size() >1 )
293  {
294  std::vector<std::string> tail (fields.begin()+1, fields.end());
295  std::string filename = boost::algorithm::join(tail, " ");
296 
297  std::ofstream os;
298  os.open(filename);
299  os << lastForwardPathMsg_;
300  os.close();
301 
302  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("serialized path: " << lastForwardPathMsg_);
303  }
304  else
305  {
306  error = true;
307  }
308  }
309  else if(cmd== "loadpath")
310  {
311  //ROS_INFO_NAMED("Backwards", "LOAD PATH COMMAND");
312  if(fields.size() >1 )
313  {
314  std::vector<std::string> tail (fields.begin()+1, fields.end());
315  std::string filename = boost::algorithm::join(tail, " ");
316 
317  std::ifstream ifs(filename);
318  std::string alltext((std::istreambuf_iterator<char>(ifs)), std::istreambuf_iterator<char>());
319 
320  nav_msgs::Path p;
321  uint32_t serial_size = ros::serialization::serializationLength(p);
322  boost::shared_array<uint8_t> buffer (new uint8_t[serial_size]);
323  ros::serialization::IStream stream(buffer.get(),serial_size);
324  ros::serialization::deserialize(stream, p);
325 
326  //ROS_INFO_STREAM_NAMED("Backwards", "serialized path: " << p);
327  lastForwardPathMsg_ = p;
328  }
329  else
330  {
331  error = true;
332  }
333  }
334  else
335  {
336  res.success.data = false;
337  return false;
338  }
339 
340  res.success.data = error;
341  return true;
342 }
343 }
